name: Best Kept Secret

config_properties.name: Best Kept Secret
config_properties.description: An indie music festival in Hilvarenbeek, Netherlands, featuring alternative, indie rock, and electronic music.

ai_profile:
**Best Kept Secret Festival 2026: A Vibrant Fusion of Sounds and Cultures**

The 2026 edition of Best Kept Secret promises an eclectic lineup of 52 artists, showcasing a rich tapestry of genres and styles. From the pulsating beats of electronic music to the gritty edge of post-punk and the soulful rhythms of R&B, the festival creates a space for diverse musical expressions. Indie rock and alternative rock remain cornerstones of the lineup, while unique flavors like Afrobeat, highlife, and traditional South African music highlight the global reach of the festival. With 98% of the artists connected via Spotify, attendees can easily explore the exciting array of sounds before the event.

This year’s festival lineup underscores its commitment to diversity and inclusion. Artists hail from 16 different countries, with strong representation from the USA, the Netherlands, the UK, and Australia, alongside talents from Ghana, South Africa, Brazil, and more. The roster also includes artists of color, making up 23% of the lineup, and features a mix of male, female, non-binary, and mixed-gender groups. This blend of backgrounds and perspectives ensures a truly global and inclusive celebration of music.

With an average rating of 7.2 and 76.9% of artists rated, the festival has garnered positive anticipation from fans and critics alike. Notably, 30% of rated acts were highly praised with scores above 8, reflecting the high-quality curation that Best Kept Secret is known for. As always, this festival remains a beacon for music lovers seeking innovation, diversity, and a shared love of live performance in a stunning setting.
